mapper.sql: id, trade_platform_id, coin_id, `type`, sort_num, `status`, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: select exists (select 1 form coin_sort where coin_sort.trade_platform_id=#{param1} and coin_sort.coin_id=#{param2} limit 1 )

select cs.id, cs.trade_platform_id, cs.coin_id, cs.type, cs.sort_num, cs.status, cs.created_at, cs.updated_at, c.id 'cId', c.name 'cName', c.status 'cStatus', c.created_at 'cUpdatedAt', c.updated_at 'cCreatedAt' from coin_sort cs left join coin c on cs.coin_id=c.id where trade_platform_id =#{tradePlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from coin_sort where coin_sort.trade_platform_id=#{param1} and coin_sort.coin_id=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into coin_sort (trade_platform_id, coin_id, `type`, sort_num, `status`, created_at, updated_at) values (#{tradePlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

trade_platform_id = #{tradePlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
